original_text: I would like all of you to speak in different kinds of languages. But even more, I want you to speak God's message clearly to people. Anyone who can speak a message from God is important in the church. He is more important than someone who speaks in different kinds of languages. That person only helps the church if someone can explain what he says. Only in that way will his message help the church to become stronger.
korean_text: 나는 너희가 다 방언 말하기를 원하나 특별히 예언하기를 원하노라 만일 방언을 말하는 자가 통역하여 교회의 덕을 세우지 아니하면 예언하는 자만 못하니라

sentences.original_text: I would like all of you
to speak in different kinds of languages
I want you to speak God's message clearly
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희가 하나님의 메시지를 분명히 말하기를 원한다

sentences.original_text: Anyone who can speak a message from God
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 메시지를 말할 수 있는 사람은

sentences.original_text: than someone who speaks in different kinds of languages
That person only helps the church
if someone can explain what he says
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 누군가 그가 말하는 것을 설명할 수 있다면

sentences.original_text: will his message help the church
